Title: Establishes the "Save our Jobs act of 2019"
Summary: Establishes the "Save our Jobs Act of 2019", and a commission established by the labor department to examine the impact of autonomous tractor trailer technology on the jobs of truck drivers and diesel mechanics.
ActClause: AN ACT establishing a commission to examine the impact of autonomous tractor trailer technology on the jobs of truck drivers and diesel mechanics; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
